name: Through The Lens (HurlCatGames)
description:
Made in 12 hours for the UNT Game Developers Club Game Jam 2021! Story

You find yourself stuck in dungeon with only your ability to jump and wall run, but you also feel enlightened. So enlightened that you can perceive the truth by using the eye of seeing! Use your skills to light the two torches and get the lost crown of Abudiggy!

Can you beat the game without dying?

Controls

-Control movement = WASD (up,left,down,right)

-Control camera = mouse

-Run = hold shift

-Jump = space bar

-Pick up/Drop an object = left click

-Throw an object = middle click (while holding object)

-Use the Eye of Seeing = right click

Advanced Controls

Wall running:

While running (with Shift), jump alongside a wall while facing parallel to it to wall run.  Be sure that you're right up against the wall.
You can jump off the wall while running using the Jump Button.

Hint: You can wall run and hold objects at the same time!

Team

Steven Hurley

Nicholas Jones

Alek Racz
